ygData.subject: Following Megatrons troops.
ygData.msgSnippet: Megaton watches the two sides go thier seperate ways and decides to follow Tankors group back to Megatron so he can fulfil his destiny. He couldn t understand

Megaton watches the two sides go thier seperate ways and decides to follow
Tankors group back to Megatron so he can fulfil his destiny. He couldn't
understand why the two groups of Predacons were fighting each other but The
dragon knew that Megatron was leading one group, he picked a group and
followed hoping to guess the right side.
